examples: Matt and Chrissy both looked equally guilty.
Matt y Chrissy parecían igualmente culpables.
John had a guilty look on his face.
John tenía una mirada culpable en su rostro.
I had a guilty conscience and could not sleep.
Tenía la conciencia culpable y no podía dormir.
I feel very guilty about leaving her.
Me siento muy culpable por dejarla.
